channel.title: Architecture :: Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops
channel.description: The Spring PetClinic Java application is a simple microservices application that consists of a frontend and backend services. The frontend service is a Spring Boot application that serves a web interface to interact with the backend services. The backend services are Spring Boot applications that serve RESTful APIâ€™s to interact with a MySQL database. By the end of this workshop, you will have a better understanding of how to enable automatic discovery and configuration for your Java-based applications running in Kubernetes.
